<The Wildest Dream
1:
--------------------
Text: The Wildest Dream:  The film interweaves two stories, one about climber Conrad Anker (who discovered Mallory's body lying on Everest in 1999) returning to Everest to investigate Mallory's disappearance and the other a biography of Mallory told through letters (read by Ralph Fiennes and Natasha Richardson), original film footage from the 1920s and archival photos.

Text: The Wildest Dream:  The film was released in the UK by Serengeti Entertainment in September 2010 as "The Wildest Dream".
